urls.title: Biden Opposed Trump's China Travel Restrictions That Experts Say Slowed Coronavirus From Spreading
urls.description: Joe Biden opposed the China travel restrictions wisely put in place by President Trump in January – restrictions that health experts credit with slowing the ...

text: @SpeakerPelosi @SquawkStreet If democrats had the common sense to work with @realDonaldTrump when he put the China travel ban in place rather than calling him a racist and saying it wasn’t needed because the coronavirus wasn’t a threat to America, things would be much better. #truth https://t.co/8eT1IfibyC
